title: Bans are Too Easy To Pull Off
body: So basically I had a game with two friends and we stumbled upon this trash Caitlyn, she refused to place wards and repeatedly told us to 'fuck off', okay we responded with some simple comebacks, but then the opponent Varus and his friends who he was grouped with told us that if Caitlyn feeds, he'll report us and since they were a 4 man it was very easy to pull off. Then we responded by saying yeah right, and then Caitlyn responding using toxic words, so we used toxic words back, Caitlyn did feed that game. Afterwards I got banned, looks like they did report me. Riot can I please have my account back, I admit I said some swear words, but only to reply back to Caitlyn and Varus. Please. Your system looks on bans as a whole not on an individual's perfomance and chat.

replies.body:
If you want community feedback on a punishment I'd recommend you post your chat logs, since we can't tell you anything beyond the very basic without knowing what you were actually punished for.

If you want to appeal your punishment then you can submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Be aware that support will not accept "they started it" as a valid defence. 

>[**WHY WAS I PUNISHED WHEN THE OTHER PERSON WAS WORSE OR STARTED IT!**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h2q2)

>[Simply speaking, retaliation is not an acceptable or justifiable behavior. An argument between two players can easily create a negative experience for the rest of the players in the game with you. Regardless of the other playerâ€™s actions, this does not justify your own behavior. You alone are responsible for your actions within the game.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h2q2)

> Your system looks on bans as a whole not on an individual's perfomance and chat.

Yes, that explains why there are so many people complaining that the system looks at *only* their behaviour, rather than considering it in context of everyone's... Besides, what the actual f\*ck does a person's *performance* have to do with their attitude?

Some important things to consider:

1. Someone else breaking the rules does ***NOT*** give you a free pass to do so as well. You will be judged on *any and all* behaviour that is in breach of the established rules and agreements. TLDR: Retaliation is considered to be just as bad as the original offence.
2. Whether it's one person or a dozen who report you, the end result will be the same. It only takes a *single* report to trigger a review (besides, I'm fairly certain that pre-mades reporting together is weighted differently anyway), and action will only be taken if there is a breach of the established rules/agreements.
3. Swearing, in and of itself, is not something that is punishable, rather it is how that profanity is used that can result in a punishment. Why the hell do you think there's an *optional* profanity filter?
TLDR; Roast noobs without breaking the rules.
1st wrong board and 2nd you admitted to breaking riot's term of use.
